subject: Fwd: Delivery question, ORDER #SSN3484
description_text:
Hi,

Its been two weeks now. And no information yet about my order. I havent had
any answers even. Its express shipping then why is it coming like a month.

Best regards,
Larsen-Klaus Tammepuu



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Larsen-Klaus Tammepuu <larsen.tammepuu@gmail.com>
Date: Wed, 19. Nov 2025 at 21:26
Subject: Delivery question, ORDER #SSN3484
To: <service@simsonn.com>


Hello,

Why my order still havent been sent already?
Or it is but the tracker is just not live.

Thanks,
Larsen-Klaus Tammepuu

conversations.body_text: Hi Larsen-Klaus Tammepuu,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326634701DE&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353
